scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run build && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:copy: mkdir -p backend/public backend/admin && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/ && cp -r admin/dist/* backend/admin/
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist admin/dist backend/public backend/admin node_modules/*/node_modules
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm ci && cd ../backend && npm ci && cd ../admin && npm ci
